participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Easy-going and friendly, enjoys simple pleasures and has a good sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i have never been out of ohio. i work for our local supermarket. my favorite band is the who. i've a cat named spook. my favorite food is pizza with black olives.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, has a deep appreciation for nature and enjoys hands-on activities.
participant_2.background: i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening. i just got a job working in a gas station. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates.
